event.name: Spring Showcase
event.shortDescription: Join us as we showcase the projects that Emerson students have co-created with community partners this semester as part of TNGV.

description.html:
Join us on April 26th for the Transforming Narratives of Gun Violence Spring Showcase. Experience live performances, a debut screening of a short documentary, and VR and 360 video from this semester's studios. We will also hear from core partners and celebrate the launch of the new TNGV website. Appetizers and drinks will be provided. Registration and completion of health attestation form is required.

The Showcase will be held at Emerson College in the Lower Level of the Little Building at 80 Boylston St.

Transforming Narratives of Gun Violence is a multi-year initiative at Emerson College in collaboration with the MGH Center for Gun Violence Prevention and the Louis D. Brown Peace Institute.
